description: Amavento Talamanca de Jarama (Ref.T003). WE DO NOT CHARGE FEES TO THE BUYER! Sell exclusive Rustic Property for Industrial and Tourist use!.Ideal for a project related to nature, for agricultural use, planting fruit trees, hotel business and many other things that you may have in mind. Whatever project you have in mind, this magnificent Finca offers you all the opportunities to develop it! This dryland cereal farm, which was previously developed as an agricultural farm, has a land area of 41,787 m2 and a constructed area of 4,092 m2, distributed as follows: 2 Warehouses, 1 "brand new" Hotel, 2 Rustic Houses, 3 Stables or Warehouse. The nature of the Finca is for double use, one Residential and the other Industrial, with a magnificent location just 40 minutes from the center of Madrid. The Residential part has a nice Hotel, two charming houses, three stables or warehouses and two bathrooms that are accessed from the garden. The hotel has an area of 250 m2 on one floor. It has a spacious living-dining room, very bright, like all its rooms, two toilets for men and women, 6 double bedrooms en suite, the master bedroom has a hydromassage bathtub and a dressing room. Another bedroom is adapted for people with disabilities. Independent kitchen equipped with all electrical appliances. Air conditioning throughout the premises with hot-cold pump, electric shutters in the living room and the master bedroom. Smooth paint on the walls, aluminum-wood exterior carpentry with climalit, tilt-and-turn, diesel heating. A 102 m2 construction, divided into two beautiful houses on one level, with access through a beautiful porch with wooden ceilings and stone slab floors. Each of the houses has a living-dining room, two bedrooms, a kitchen equipped with all electrical appliances and a complete bathroom with a shower tray and screen. One of them has a cozy fireplace with a mini-bar in the living room, all framed in a beautiful ceiling with wooden slats and beams. Both houses have white aluminum exterior carpentry with climalit, both have oil heating and one of them has additional electric heating, the hot water is different in the two houses, one is for diesel and the other for electricity. The stables, which can also be converted into a warehouse, are on one floor of 150 m2, consisting of three spaces and two toilets. In the Industrial part, it has an extensive area of dry cereal, without horizontal division, with two large warehouses, on one level, with a construction area of 1,260 m2 in each of them, measuring 105 m2 long by 12 m2. wide and independent water tanks. It has an electric car charger, "Tesla". These ships are separated from each other and are intended for the use that you want to develop: agricultural-storage, among others.

Townhouse in Talamanca del Jarama Immerse yourself in the unique experience of living in Talamanca del Jarama, a hidden treasure in the Community of Madrid that fuses rural tranquility with modern comforts and discover this rural gem.This charming two-storey townhouse redefines comfort and lifestyle, offering a haven of serenity in an exceptional setting. On the ground floor, you will be greeted by a garage with space for a car, a motorcycle and storage, as well as an exceptionally large and bright living room with a cozy fireplace that illuminates, providing warmth and becoming the heart of the home.There is also the kitchen, complete with a functional pantry and access to the patio, and a guest toilet that adds practicality.But that's not all: the front and back patios are true treasures, with a sink, a vegetable garden area and a seating space to enjoy the sun and breezes outdoors as well as a place where the children can play. On the upper floor, a bathroom with a shower and four bedrooms create a perfect environment for rest.The master suite with its own private bathroom offers an exclusive retreat, and one of the bedrooms features a terrace to enjoy the views. With 177 m2 built, distributed in 145 dwellings and 20 garages, in addition to 157 square meters of the two patios, this house sits on a total land of 250 m2.But that is not all; The house has a photovoltaic energy installation, reducing the consumption of electricity, heating and air conditioning to only about 30 euros per month or even less in spring and autumn.Each bedroom and living room are equipped with split air conditioning for personalized climate control and radiators in each room. In addition, the common areas elevate the living experience with a swimming pool for adults and children, a soccer field, a tennis court and a children's playground.And for your peace of mind, plumbing renovations were carried out in drains and bathrooms, ensuring the quality and comfort you deserve. Don't miss the opportunity to make this house your home.Here, every day is an invitation to enjoy the serenity and authenticity of country life, without giving up urban comforts. Talamanca del Jarama, an expanding area with its picturesque charm and cobblestone streets, offers an unmatched quality of life.Imagine strolling through its cobblestone squares, discovering the richness of local cuisine in its cozy restaurants and immersing yourself in the culture and history that permeate every corner of the town. The community has a variety of services that make daily life easier.From small local shops to markets offering fresh, quality products, Talamanca del Jarama gives you the opportunity to appreciate the authenticity of rural life without sacrificing comfort. As for connections, living in Talamanca del Jarama does not mean moving away from the capital.With excellent transport options, you will find yourself just a step away from Madrid.The proximity to highways and the availability of public transportation will allow you to comfortably travel to the city in a short period of time.Thus, you can enjoy the tranquility of your home in Talamanca del Jarama while maintaining easy access to the opportunities and dynamism that the capital offers. Living in Talamanca del Jarama is discovering a perfect balance between the peace of the rural environment and the vitality of urban life.Don't miss the opportunity to be part of this unique experience! Contact us today to explore the possibilities of your new home in this charming corner of the Community of Madrid.

The atmosphere is ideal and very picturesque. We invite you to visit this magnificent property. Talamanca de Jarama is a municipality and Spanish town in the Community of Madrid. It is located in the northern part of this autonomous community, on the border with Castilla-La Mancha. Its term extends over the natural region of Campiña del Henares and the middle section of the Jarama River runs through it. The town has a rich historical-artistic heritage and it preserves the Romanesque and Romanesque-Mudejar vestiges of greatest architectural value existing in the northeast of Madrid. Its urban area corresponds to the old Plaza Fuerte and Arrabal, neighborhoods separated by the Valdejudíos stream. The town is set up in a completely walled area, very characteristic of Castile, during the Middle Ages.
